said David Letterman .`` Being pummeled?'' Anderson Cooper said.`` I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before.'' He described the scene, saying, People came from all around, surrounding us, punching us, kicking us, trying to rip the clothes off my female producer. It was weird. And we were lucky, frankly.... I would start to slap back and then realize this is going to make it worse. My adrenline was pumping so much. I've never really been in a fight like this or attacked by a mob like this. I thought I was saying calm down, as if they could understand what I was saying. She added: We now have more knowledge about the kind of parenting that really harms children. Assessments should be skilled enough to distinguish between the families most in need and the parents who are struggling and just need a bit of help, possibly not from social workers. Ms. Munro has also criticised the amount of statutory guidance being offered by Whitehall, an area Education Secretary Michael Gove is keen to tackle as well and has launched a pilot programme in Cumbria, Knowsley, Westminster

Killer bees, space aliens, and now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states. As reported, a number of members of Congress have been href="http://www.nytimes.com/2011/01/21/business/economy/21bankruptcy.html"> quietly looking into possible amendments to the federal bankruptcy code to accommodate the states, which can not now declare bankruptcy.
